Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: I feel my supervisor still hold a personal judgement (even an unconscious bias) that sometimes affects his feedback. AI (depending on how I ask for the feedback can be more direct on the points I specifically ask for feedback
